comments:
This course covers congruences, Diophantine equations, continued fractions,
nonlinear congruences, and quadratic residues.
Students described this course as being very uninformative. Few students showed
up for class and even those that did seemed to not be paying attention. Students felt that
they gained little from this class in terms of information
Professor Freyd was described as being very difficult to follow and extremely
tangential. Professor Freyd was often described as “showing off” and seemed to do very
little with regards to helping students understand the material.
Students described this course as very easy and some did not even wish to show
up for class. The class consisted of a take-home midterm and a final project, so no work
was needed to be prepared ahead of time.
